main_definition: A collection of people or things that are considered together because they share common characteristics or are related in some way.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An assortment of individuals who come together for a specific purpose, such as a project or activity
meanings_and_examples.example: The study group meets every Thursday to discuss their assignments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collection of objects that are organized based on common attributes or functions
meanings_and_examples.example: This computer store sells various electronic components in groups, such as processors and graphics cards.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People who share a specific characteristic, interest, or affiliation
meanings_and_examples.example: The environmental group advocates for policies to protect endangered species.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set of items that are grouped together due to their similar nature or purpose
meanings_and_examples.example: In the kitchen drawer, we keep our silverware in groups by utensil type (forks, knives, spoons).

meanings_and_examples.definition: People who work together as a team within an organization or company
meanings_and_examples.example: The marketing department forms small groups to brainstorm creative ideas for new campaigns.
